replies.author: 椎名雪穗
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.7.10][NewFoods2——新的食物2] 本帖最后由 爱无名灬颂 于 2016-5-21 21:43 编辑 





logo_6900431.jpg (32.09 KB, 下载次数: 122)

下载附件

2015-8-29 17:31 上传





又是一个小mod，不喜勿喷。

也就像标题那样说的，加了更多的食物，其实也不算很多...

-黄油
-华夫饼
-饼干
-三明治
-半面包
-冰淇淋
-冰淇淋华夫饼
-藻（吃了它会有水下呼吸的效果）
-米饭
-寿司
-小麦饼干
-面粉
-熟腐肉
-焦糖
-焦糖苹果
-盐
-三种巧克力
-吐司
-黄油吐司
以及更多...




2015-08-29_00.41.32.png (177.75 KB, 下载次数: 123)

下载附件

2015-8-29 17:39 上传





还有一些特殊的食物
-矿工餐
-远行者餐
-隐匿者餐
-战士餐
-弓弩手餐


增加了一些方块

-糖块
-盐矿
-盐块
-焦糖块
-金糖块
-黑糖块




2015-08-29_00.42.03.png (381.06 KB, 下载次数: 126)

下载附件

2015-8-29 17:43 上传





图片中的方块顺序与描述的并不是一个顺序，不要在意我手上的是什么←_←

戳我到原帖下载

更新日记

Update #12 : 09/12/2014 1:15:40 pm9/12/14v. 2.2.1

+ Toast,
+ Toast with Butter,
+ Apple in Chocolate,

* New texture for Rice in Caramel,
Update #11 : 09/12/2014 2:26:51 am9/12/14v. 2.2.0 (Updated to 1.7.10.)

+ Chocolate,
+ Dark chocolate,
+ White chocolate,
+ Magic sugar,
+ ChangeLog.txt file with every changes in .jar,

* Now you can eat Butter!!! (many people wanted to eat it, but it wasn't edible),
* Butter has been moved from materials creative tab to food creative tab,
* Backed to old Sushi texture,
* Changed name of Algs to Algae (my bad translation, sorry),
* Now Black sugar, Algae and Rice are craftable,
* Bug fixing,

- Special Wheat,
- Special Seeds,
- Sugar & Coal,
Update #10 : 01/04/2014 2:37:11 pm1/04/14Added YouTube video by DartfE
Update #9 : 01/04/2014 4:31:04 am1/04/14v: 2.0.2

New Golden Sugar texture.
Updated screenshots.
Bug fixed.
Update #8 : 12/30/2013 11:37:53 am12/30/13v: 2.0.1

Added Salt Ore.

Deleted Special Coal.
Update #7 : 12/30/2013 9:46:21 am12/30/13v: 2.0
Updated to MC 1.6.4.
Now on forge.

Added blocks:
- Block of sugar,
- Block of salt,
- Block of caramel,
- Block of golden sugar,
- Block of black sugar,

And some food and normal items:
- Flour,
- Cooked rotten flesh,
- Caramel,
- Apple in caramel,
- Special salt,
- Special seeds,
- Special wheat,

New IDs.

Better textures.
Changed:
- Miner Food to Miner Cookie,
- Sprinter Food to Sprinter Cookie;
- Fighter Food to Fighter Cookie,
- Escaper Food to Escaper Cookie,
- Archer Food to Archer Cookie
Update #6 : 05/18/2013 7:41:07 am5/18/13Fixed bug with wheat cookie
Update #5 : 05/14/2013 10:09:11 am5/14/13Fixed bugs
Update #4 : 05/09/2013 10:56:43 am5/09/13Updated to Minecraft 1.5.2

Add:
- Wheat cookie.
Update #3 : 05/09/2013 10:02:10 am5/09/13Add:
- 4 archeviements.
Update #2 : 05/08/2013 11:43:24 am5/08/13Add:
- Algs,
- Rice,
- Sushi,
- Salt,
- 5 Super Food,
- 2 archieviements.

Change:
- Crackers crafting
Update #1 : 05/06/2013 11:15:45 am5/06/13Changed sandwich crafting.


然而我并没有找到NewFood1
